long_description: Ideal for outdoor and everyday use, the compact Surefire EB1 Backup flashlight is only 4 in. long so it fits easily in a backpack pocket or clipped to a belt. Virtually indestructible, power-regulated LED outputs a bright 200-lumen beam on high; switch to low for a 5-lumen output for the right amount of light to read a map. Rugged aerospace-grade aluminum body withstands regular use in the outdoors and around the house; O-rings seal out moisture. Total Internal Reflection (TIR) lens focuses light into a smooth beam with maximum output. Operates on 1 included CR123A lithium battery; batteries provide up to 37 hrs. of use on low and 1.3 hrs. of use on high. Rear push-button on/off switch is simple to operate; press tail cap switch for momentary on and click it for constant on. 2-way clip on handle lets you attach the SureFire EB1 Backup flashlight with the bezel facing up or down.
short_description: Ideal for outdoor and everyday use, the compact Surefire EB1 Backup flashlight is only 4 in. long so it fits easily in a backpack pocket or clipped to a belt.
